item.title: MMM
item.description: score:2 Chances: 3M (MMM) has shown a +0.5% change compared to its last close, indicating positive momentum. The company has a strong Transportation and Electronics segment, which is contributing to its growth. The appointment of William M. “Bill” Brown as the new CEO is a positive development for the company.
